featuristic.synthesis.SymbolicFunction#

class featuristic.synthesis.SymbolicFunction(func: Callable, arg_count: int, format_str: str, name: str)[source]#

An internal class used to represent the symbolic functions used to generate new features by the GeneticFeatureGenerator class.

__init__(func: Callable, arg_count: int, format_str: str, name: str)[source]#

Initialize the SymbolicFunction class.

Parameters:

  • func (function) – The function to use.

  • arg_count (int) – The number of arguments the function takes.

  • format_str (str) – The format string for the function.

Methods

__init__(func, arg_count, format_str, name)

Initialize the SymbolicFunction class.
